thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 08 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Diamondrock Announces CFO Transition

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Diamondrock Announces CFO Transition
text:
Jan 8 (Reuters) - Diamondrock Hospitality Co:
* SAYS CFO SEAN M. MAHONEY RESIGNED * - CO CURRENTLY EXPECTS Q4 REVPAR GROWTH TO COME IN JUST UNDER HIGH END OF ITS IMPLIED GUIDANCE OF 4.0 PERCENT
* DIAMONDROCK ANNOUNCES CFO TRANSITION & PROVIDES UPDATE ON FOURTH QUARTER OPERATIONS
* DIAMONDROCK HOSPITALITY - EXPECTS TO RECOGNIZE $4 MILLION TO $5 MILLION OF BUSINESS INTERRUPTION INSURANCE INCOME RELATED TO RECENT NATURAL DISASTERS IN Q4 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
